sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 76 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description:
Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,212 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 781,702 Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Mechano-Core Amplifier

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful abilities have a chance to power the amplifier, randomly increasing either your highest secondary stat by 4,211 or your lowest secondary stat by 5,313 for 10 sec.

description: Intended for machine use only. Use at your own risk.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 117,913 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Best-in-Slots

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 3,996 to 4,884 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec.
Use: Cheat to immediately gain 4,884 of your highest secondary stat for 15 sec. While out of combat, reconfigure for spell casting instead. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: The wise goblin makes their own luck.
